# Warrior Leap

> Lebanon's premier cold therapy and ice tub provider. Premium recovery equipment for athletes and wellness enthusiasts.

## About

Warrior Leap is Lebanon's leading supplier of ice baths, ice tubs, and cold plunge systems. We provide premium cold therapy equipment designed for recovery, wellness, and athletic performance. Based in Beirut, we deliver across all of Lebanon including Tripoli, Sidon, Jounieh, and more.

**Tagline:** Achieve Your More

## Products

We offer a complete range of cold therapy equipment:

- [Ice Bath Chiller 2HP](https://warriorleap.com/products/ice-bath-chiller-2hp): Professional-grade water chiller for ice baths
- [Ice Bath Chiller 1HP](https://warriorleap.com/products/ice-bath-chiller-1hp): Compact water chiller for home use
- [Ice Bath System Round](https://warriorleap.com/products/ice-bath-system-round): Complete round ice bath system with chiller
- [Ice Bath System Oval](https://warriorleap.com/products/ice-bath-system-oval): Complete oval ice bath system with chiller
- [Round Ice Tub](https://warriorleap.com/products/round-ice-tub): Standalone round ice tub
- [Oval Ice Tub](https://warriorleap.com/products/oval-ice-tub): Standalone oval ice tub

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://warriorleap.com/): Main landing page with product overview

- [Blog](https://warriorleap.com/blog): Cold therapy tips, guides, and insights

## Benefits of Cold Therapy

- Faster muscle recovery
- Reduced inflammation
- Improved circulation
- Enhanced mental clarity
- Better sleep quality
- Boosted immune system

We deliver to all regions in Lebanon:
- Beirut
- Tripoli
- Sidon
- Jounieh
- Mount Lebanon
- And more
